```{r}
# Source report text from Word doc

  file1 = "../../data/1-source/report-text.docx",

)

# Source text replacements
source("replace-pdf.R")
```

```{r}
# Insert figures and captions
doc <- stringr::str_replace_all(doc, replacements)
```

```{r}
doc <- doc[which(grepl("^= Introduction", doc)):length(doc)]

doc <- paste(doc, collapse = "\n")
```
